column8: ;IF CY=1 , INCREMENTS CONTENT OF REG C BY 1
;STORE CARRY IN NEXT CONSECUTIVE MEMORY LOCATION
Subtract contents of Reg. B from Contents of Reg. A
If S-0, Transfer Program Control to Label DOWN
Find 1'S Compliment of contents of Reg. A
ADD 01H into contents of Reg. A
Store absolute difference into memory location
Add multiplicand into contents of Reg. A
;If CY = 0, Transfer Program Control to Label DOWN
IF Z=O TRANSFER PROGRAM CONTROL TO LABEL UP
Copy Product into Memory location C032H
Clear accumulator to store initial Remainder
Store initial Quotient as 00H in Reg.C
Point towards Dividend at memory location C030H
: If Dividend < Divisor i.e.CY = 1 GO TO Label DOWN
If Dividend > Divisor i.e CY = 0 Subtract Divisor from Dividend
; Transfer program control to Label UP
Store the Quotient in current memory location
Store Remainder in current memory location
